text:
Popular mobile apps use viral loops, user-generated content, and social mechanics...
AI apps today include avatar generators, voice cloning, meme creators...

AI Agents coordinate tools, memory, and workflows to perform complex tasks...
Some agents negotiate with each other or work in teams...

Large language models (LLMs) are neural networks trained on massive corpora...
LLMs are used for chatbots, summarization, automation...

# Sample Document

This is a sample document for testing the document indexing system.

## Features

- Document chunking
- Embedding generation
- FAISS indexing
- Semantic search

The system processes text files and creates searchable embeddings.
